skins.shipDescription: Eagle-class light aircraft carrier C Eagle (HMS Eagle.)
skins.selfIntroduction: After having been converted from a battleship into an aircraft carrier, I provided much early experience for the Royal Navy's carrier forces, and my final moments were spent fighting on the battlefield. Though I met a noble warrior's end, I do wish I'd been done in by a cannon or an airstrike, rather than a submarine.
skins.acquisition: The name is Eagle. I intend to serve your fleet to the utmost of my abilities as a proud warrior of the Royal Navy.
skins.login: Great to see you! Based upon your punctuality, I can already tell that you're a responsible commander.
skins.details: There are many Royal Navy ships named "Eagle," and I will go great lengths to maintain its honourable reputation.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Let's see what's on the menu today... Fruits and a vegetable salad. Ideal for a low-calorie diet.
skins.secretaryIdle2: How much do I weigh? Ahem, you'd better drop this topic, or else...! Okay, I'm just exaggerating. But I hope you understand that it's a sensitive topic for me.
skins.secretaryIdle3: A band of Iron Blood submarines ran away before I could as much as say hello. Again... Guess I'll have to come up with a good way of approaching them.
skins.secretaryTouch: What is it? An invitation to get lunch? Hmm... Sorry, but could you go in my place?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: You see, this is the reason why we have to teach people proper etiquette.

skins.shipDescription: This may be an exercise, but even so I will give it my all. Right now, I am not just a Royal Navy warrior, but a medical resident as well. If you ever feel ill, come see me, Commander.
skins.acquisition: This may be an exercise, but even so I will give it my all. Right now, I am not just a Royal Navy warrior, but a medical resident as well. If you ever feel ill, come see me, Commander.
skins.login: Debrief me on your symptoms. Oh, that doesn't sound like what a doctor would say? Then how about... Do you feel ill?
skins.details: I've come well prepared in hopes of learning the ropes of our infirmary.
skins.secretaryIdle1: I've come up with a new, healthy diet that improves your physical stamina. Care to give it a try?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Treating wounds and saving lives C being a doctor comes with great responsibility, but also great pride.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Are you scared of needles, Commander? I understand. Then as part of this training, we should give you a shot, just soC Oh, okay, maybe we shouldn't.
skins.secretaryTouch: Let's take your temperature, just to be sure. Mind if I assist with that?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Umm... Are you feeling lightheaded, Commander? Do you need a thorough examination?
